attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent, I wanted to take a moment to make you aware of the
perhaps unintended or unanticipated consequences of these new rules proposed.
Internatinal adoption is a VERY slow and paperwork filled process, and getting
slower all the time, for many reasons. It is a very difficult process emotionally and
very expensive, even with tax credits. Because fingerprints and I600As expire very
often before the adoption process is completed, families are forced to not only add
to the frustration of the process by needlessly repeating these processes, but to
pay all over again as well! Now these new fee increasese will make this already
horrible process even more of a burden on adoptive families! I urge you to
PLEASE reconsider this rule change for adoptive families, who are caught up in a
system that is already frustrating enough! Thank you for your time and
compassion.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela Kinzinger
